submittedOn.description: The date the pensions income was added. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

items.description: Financial details about foreign pensions income

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must in a ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

amountBeforeTax.description: The total amount before any tax taken off pension. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxTakenOff.description: The amount of tax taken off pension. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

specialWithholdingTax.description: Special Withholding Tax (SWT) amount taken off this payment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether Foreign Tax Credit Relief (FTCR) has been claimed.

taxableAmount.description: This is the amount that will be liable to income tax and forms part of the total taxable income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: Financial details about overseas pension contributions income

customerReference.description: A reference the user supplies to identify the record.

exemptEmployersPensionContribs.description: The amount the employer contributes to the overseas pension scheme. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

migrantMemReliefQopsRefNo.description: The qualifying overseas pension scheme reference number for migrant member relief.

dblTaxationRelief.description: The relief given as tax credit on the overseas earnings. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

dblTaxationCountryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents the double taxation country name. The value must be ISO 3166-1 alpha-3

dblTaxationTreaty.description: The name of the treaty that has the right to collect tax.

sf74reference.description: The SF74 reference number for transitional corresponding relief claims.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative URL of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The ‘rel’ will be ‘self’ where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
